name: cuberl
description:
Welcome experiment 42. Your job here is to escape The cube.
You can die trying, that's part of the contract you signed.
What? You didn't sign a contract for this? SURE! Take a look
in your inventory, you have a copy of it.
You are in a cube composed by 3x3x3 [27] room. Every now and
then some room will be moved with their content.
Your objective is to find the room with the exit ['X'] in it and wait until it turn green, then you'll be free. There are other experiments like you and traps, keep your eyes open.
These are the rules:
1) SURVIVE!
... that's it! Easy, no? OH! If you don't know how to human, use ? [Help]
